testcase.name: Checking the required fields for registration.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the user can not register without filling in all of the required fields.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the registration Allegro page.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields apart from the field "Email".
step.expectedresults: The user has not been registered. There is an error message about  the "Email" field being empty.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields apart from the field "Hasło".
step.expectedresults: The user has not been registered. There is an error message about  the "Hasło" field being empty.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields apart from the field "Dzień".
step.expectedresults: The user has not been registered. There is an error message about  the "Dzień" field being empty.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields apart from the field "Miesiąc".
step.expectedresults: The user has not been registered. There is an error message about  the "Miesiąc" field being empty.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields apart from the field "Rok".
step.expectedresults: The user has not been registered. There is an error message about  the "Rok" field being empty.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields apart from the field for accepting Allegro regulations.
step.expectedresults: The user has not been registered. There is an error message about  the accepting Allegro regulation field being empty.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields.
step.expectedresults: The user has been successfully registered.

testcase.name: Email field verification.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the field accepts only correct email address, which has proper form and doesn't contain diacritical marks and free space.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the Allegro registration page.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields. Fill in the "Email" field with email address that contains space.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message saying that the "Email" field has been incorrectly filled in.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields. Fill in the "Email" field with email address that contains diacritical marks.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message saying that the "Email" field has been incorrectly filled in.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields. Fill in the "Email" field with email address that contains special marks as well as numbers.
step.expectedresults: The user has been successfully registered.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields. Fill in the "Email" field with email address that contains only big letters.
step.expectedresults: The user has been successfully registered.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields. Fill in the "Email" field with email address which has incorrect form, for example: @boren90.wp.pl.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message saying that the "Email" field has been incorrectly filled in.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields. Fill in the "Email" field with email address that has correct form, for example: korek90@wp.pl
step.expectedresults: The user has been successfully registered.

testcase.name: Hasło field verification.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the "Hasło" field accepts all of the symbols/marks, and to register, the password must contain at least 8 symbols, 1 big letter, 1 small letter and 1 number.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the registration page.

step.actions: Fill in the "Hasło" field with diacritical marks, special symbols, numbers, space as well as big letters and small ones.
step.expectedresults: The "Hasło" field should accept of the symbols.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields. Fill in the "Hasło" field with this data: MartekCZ.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message saying that the password doesn't contain a number.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields. Fill in the "Hasło" field with this data: kO8re.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message saying that the password is too short.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields. Fill in the "Hasło" field with this data: martek89.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message saying that the password doesn't contain a big letter.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields. Fill in the "Hasło" field with this data: "*).
step.expectedresults: There is an error message saying that the password doesn't contain at least one small and big letter, a number and is too short.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields. Fill in the "Hasło" field with this data: Martek89.
step.expectedresults: The user has been successfully registered.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields. Fill in the "Hasło" field with this data: Martek2445KOKOnas.
step.expectedresults: The user has been successfully registered using long password.

testcase.name: Dzień field verification.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the field accepts only numbers by using the keyboard or a mouse.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the Allegro registration page.

step.actions: Fill in the "Dzień" field with diacritical marks, special symbols, space and letters.
step.expectedresults: The field shouldn't accept this kind of data.

step.actions: Set up a day using arrows.
step.expectedresults: Arrows should work properly. The upper arrow sets up a day ascending, and the lower arrow descending.

testcase.name: Miesiąc field verification.
testcase.summary:
We are confirming that the "Miesiąć" field works properly and it can be also set up by using a mouse.

You can navigate through all of the months on the list by using the keyboard and typing in the first letter of a month that you are interested in.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the Allegro registration page.

step.actions: Try to fill in the "Miesiąc" field with diacritical marks, special signs, space and letters.
step.expectedresults: The field accepts only umbers.

step.actions: Click on the "Miesiąc" field and pick a random month from the list.
step.expectedresults: Chosen month should show up inside the "Miesiąć" field.

step.actions: Click on the "Miesiąć" field and type in the first letter of a month that you are interested in.
step.expectedresults: Inside the field shows up a month that starts with the letter which has been typed by the user.

step.actions: Click on the "Miesiąć" field and type in the first letter of a month that you are interested in (use only big letters).
step.expectedresults: Inside the field shows up a month that starts with the letter which has been typed by the user.

step.actions: Click the "Miesiąc" field and type in the first letter of a month that starts with "m", "s" or "l". Use the same letter at least three times.
step.expectedresults: Inside the field shows up a month that starts with the letter which has been typed by the user. By typing in the same letter a few times it's possible to navigate to months that starts with the same letter.

step.actions: Click the "Miesiąć" field and try to type in a full name of a random month.
step.expectedresults: It is impossible to type in a full name of a month using the keyboard.

testcase.name: Rok field verification.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the "Rok" field works properly and accepts only numbers using a mouse and  a keyboard.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the Allegro registration page.

step.actions: Fill the "Rok" field with diacritical marks, special signs, space and letters.
step.expectedresults: The field should accept only numbers.

step.actions: Use arrows to set up a random year.
step.expectedresults: Arrows should work properly. The upper arrow sets up a year ascending, and the lower arrow descending.

testcase.name: Checking functionality that shows encrypted password.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this functionality shows encrypted passwords and encryptes showed ones. By default the entered password should be encrypted.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the Allegro registration page and the "Hasło" field is filled with random data.

step.actions: Click the icon that looks like a crossed eye.
step.expectedresults: The icon now should look just like an eye, and the password should be decrypted.

step.actions: Click the decryption icon, twice.
step.expectedresults: The icon now should look just like an eye, and the password should be encrypted.

step.actions: Clear the "Hasło" field. Click the decryption icon and fill in the field with random data again.
step.expectedresults: The password should be decrypted.

step.actions: Click the decryption icon and refresh the page.
step.expectedresults: The functionality that decrypts the password should go back to it's default stage which is encrypting the entered password.

step.actions: Make sure that the password you typed in also contains diacrytical marks, special signs and some numbers then click the decrytpion icon.
step.expectedresults: The password should be decrypted and shown as it is.

testcase.name: Checking functionality that translates the registration page..
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this functionality  translates the page in the right way (from polish to english and from english to polish).
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the Allegro registration page.

step.actions: Click the "English Version" link.
step.expectedresults: The page is translated to english.

step.actions: Click the "Polisg Version" link.
step.expectedresults: The page should be translated to polish.

step.actions: Click the "English Version" link, after that refresh the page.
step.expectedresults: The site should remeber the picked option and still show the form in english.

step.actions: Click the "Polish Version" link, after that refresh the page.
step.expectedresults: The site should remember the picked option and still show the form in polish.

step.actions: Click the  "English Version" link. Close Allegro website and open it again. Go back to the Allegro registration page.
step.expectedresults: The site should remember the picked option and still show the form in english.

step.actions: Click the "Polish Version" link. Close Allegro website and open it again. Go back to the Allegro registration page.
step.expectedresults: The site should remember the picked option and still show the form in polish.

testcase.name: An attempt to register a user with the same login name,
testcase.summary: We are confirming that it's not possible to register a user with the same data that already exists in the database.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the Allegro registration page, a user X already exists in the database.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields with the same data that was used to register the user X.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message saying that an account with this data already exists in Allegro database.

testcase.name: An attempt to register a user with banned account.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that a user that has been blocked can't register using the same data of banned account.
testcase.preconditions: The user's account has been banned,  the user is on the Allegro registration page.

step.actions: Fill in all the required fields with the same data of banned account.
step.expectedresults: The user using this data can't register.

testcase.name: An attempt to register a user with deleted account.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the user with deleted account can be successfully registered.
testcase.preconditions: The user had an accout but the account has been deleted, the user is on the Allegro registration page.

step.actions: Fill in all of the required fields with the same data of the deleted account.
step.expectedresults: The user has been successfully registered.

testcase.name: Checking functionality that selects account types.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this functionality shows the appropriate form for a given option.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the Allegro registration page.

step.actions: Try to pick two options : "Konto Zwykłe" and "Konto Firmowe".
step.expectedresults: Picking two options is impossible.

step.actions: Pick "Konto Firmowe".
step.expectedresults: The right form has been diplayed for the given option.

step.actions: Pick "Konto Zwykłe".
step.expectedresults: The right form has been displayed for the given option.

step.actions: Try to deselect any of options by clicking on emply spaces on the page.
step.expectedresults: Deselecting any of option is impossible.

testcase.name: Checking the dafault account selection which is Regular account.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the default account is always regular account.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the Allegro registration page.

step.actions: Go back to the Allegro main page and click "Załóż Konto" button.
step.expectedresults: Regular account should be set by default.

step.actions: Go back to the Allegro main page and click "Założ Konto" button. Next pick Business account and use this address: https://allegro.pl/rejestracja#/
step.expectedresults: Regular account should be set again, by default.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of the date of birth fields.
testcase.summary: We confirm that the dates are correctly adjusted to the days of the months and the year.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the Allegro registration page.

step.actions: Fill in the "Dzień" field with a number 31, for the field "Miesiąc" set February, and pick any randon year from 1900-2020.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message about the wrong day, because February usually has 28 days.

step.actions: Fill in the "Dzień" field with a number 29, for the field "Miesiąc" set February, and set a year to 2004.
step.expectedresults: The date should be accepted. This is the so-called LEAP-year, it happens every four years, where February exceptionally has 29 days instead of 28.

step.actions: Fill in the "Dzień" field with a number 30, for the field "Miesiąc" set September, and set a random year between 1900-2020.
step.expectedresults: The date is accepted, but when you type in a year bigger than 2006 then there is a problem with age of the user. The user can't be younger than 14 to register.

testcase.name: Boundary values for the "Rok" field.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that it is impossible to set up a year that is smaller than 1900 and bigger that our current year 2020.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the Allegro registration page and filled in all of the required fields apart from the "Rok" field.

step.actions: In the "Rok" field type in 1899 year.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message saying that the min. year that can be set is 1900.

step.actions: In the "Rok" field type in 2021 year.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message saying that the max. year that can be set is 2020.

step.actions: In the "Rok" field type in 1901 year.
step.expectedresults: The user has been successfully registered.

step.actions: In the "Rok" field type in 2019 year.
step.expectedresults: The user has been successfully registered.

step.actions: In the "Rok" field using arrows set a year smaller than 1900.
step.expectedresults: Its impossible to set up a year smaller than 1900.

step.actions: In the "Rok" field using arrows set a year bigger than 2020.
step.expectedresults: It's impossible to set up a year bigger than 2020.

step.actions: In the "Rok" field type in a three or two digit number.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message about the wrong year.

step.actions: In the "Rok" field type in a five-digit number.
step.expectedresults: It's impossible to type in a year that has more than 4 digits.

step.actions: Try to fill in the "Rok" field with numbers smaller than 0.
step.expectedresults: The field shouldn't accept numbers smaller than 0.

testcase.name: Boundary values for the "Dzień" field.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the field doesn't accept digits smaller than 1 and bigger than 31.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the Allegro registration page and filled in all of the required fields  apart from the "Dzień" field.

step.actions: Fill in the "Dzień" field with a number smaller than 0.
step.expectedresults: The field doesn't accept smaller numbers than 0.

step.actions: Fill in the "Dzień" field with a number 0.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message about the wrong day.

step.actions: Fill in the "Dzień" field with a number bigger than 31.
step.expectedresults: The field doesn't accept numbers bigger than 31.

step.actions: Fill the "Dzień" field with a three-digit number.
step.expectedresults: The field doesn't accept three-digit numbers.

step.actions: Fill in the "Dzień" field with numbers between 1 and 31.
step.expectedresults: The user has been successfully registered.

testcase.name: Boundary values for the user's age.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the user younger than 14 can't register.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the Allegro registration page.

step.actions: Type in this date: 16 July 2007.
step.expectedresults: The date is accepted.

step.actions: Type in this date: 16 August 2006.
step.expectedresults: The date is accepted.

step.actions: Type in this date: 16 August 2007.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message that the user has to have at least 14 years to be able to register.

step.actions: Type in this date: 16 July 2008.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message that the user has to have at least 14 years to be able to register.

testcase.name: Checking the required fields for logging in.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that user is able to log in only when he/she filled in all of the required fields.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the Allegro login page.

step.actions: Fill in the "login lub e-mail" field, the field "hasło" leave empty.
step.expectedresults: The website displayed error message that the field "hasło" is required.

step.actions: Fill in the "hasło" field, leave the "login lub e-mail" field empty.
step.expectedresults: The website displayed error message that the field "login lub email" is required.

step.actions: Fill in the "login lub e-mail" as well as "hasło" fields.
step.expectedresults: The user has been successfully logged in to Allegro.

step.actions: Leave the "Login lub e-mail" and "hasło" fields empty.
step.expectedresults: The website displayed error message that both fields are required.

testcase.name: Validation of the Login/Email and the Hasło field.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the fields accept only and only data that exsists already in the data base and that this data is correctly assigned to the user.
testcase.preconditions: The user has at least two accounts on the Allegro website, the user is on the login page.

step.actions: Fill in the field "Login lub email". The field 'Hasło' fill in with data that does not exsist in the Allegro's data base.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message displayed that the field "Login lub email" or "Hasło" are not correct.

step.actions: Fill in the "Login lub email" and "Hasło" fieds with data of the first account or the second one.
step.expectedresults: The user has been successfully logged in to Allegro.

step.actions: Fill in the field "Login lub email" with data that does not exsist in the data base, while the field "Hasło" fill in with correct data that was used while registering one of the Allegro accounts.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message displayed about incorrect data.

step.actions: Fill in the field "Login lub email" with correct data that was used while registering one of the Allegro accounts, while the field "Hasło" fill in with data that does not exsist in the data base.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message displayed about incorrect data.

step.actions: Fill in the "Login lub e-mail" field with data of the first account, but the field "Hasło" fill in with data of the second account.
step.expectedresults: There is an error displayed about incorrect data.

step.actions: Fill in the "Login lub e-mail" field with data of the second account, but the field "Hasło" fill in with data of the first account.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message displayed about incorrect data.

testcase.name: Checking functionality that shows encrypted password.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this functionality shows encrypted passwords and encryptes showed ones. By default the entered password should be encrypted.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on Allegro login page, the "Hasło" field is filled in with random data.

step.actions: Click the icon that looks like a crossed eye.
step.expectedresults: The icon now looks like an eye and the password  should be shown.

step.actions: Click the decrypting icon, twice.
step.expectedresults: The icon should look like a crossed eye and the password should be encrypted.

step.actions: Decrypt the password, after this refresh the page.
step.expectedresults: The functionality that decrypts the password should go back to it's default stage which is encrypting the entered password.

step.actions: The password that has been entered should also contain diacritical marks, special ones as well as numbers then click the decrypting icon.
step.expectedresults: The whole password should be properly decrypted and shown as it is.

step.actions: Remove the entered password. Click the decrypting icon and then fill in the field "Hasło" again.
step.expectedresults: The entered password isn't encrypted.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of logging into Allegro using Facebook account.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the user is successfully logged in to Allegro website using existing Facebook account.
testcase.preconditions: The user has an account on Allegro and at least two Facebook accounts. One facebook account should have the same email address for which the registration was made on the Allegro website, and another account should have completely different email address. The user is on the login Allegro page.

step.actions: Click the "Zaloguj przez Facebook" button. Use Facebook account with the same email address, that was also used to register on Allegro website.
step.expectedresults: The message about connecting both accounts has been displayed. The user is successfully logged into Allegro Account.

step.actions: Click "Zaloguj przez Facebook" button. Use Facebook account with different email address, than email that was also used to register on Allegro webiste.
step.expectedresults: The user didn't log in. There is a message that given email address doesn't exist in the data base. There is also a short form to register on Allegro website.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of logging into Allegro using Google account.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the user is successfully logged in to Allegro website using existing Google account.
testcase.preconditions: The user has an account on Allegro and  at least two Google accounts. One Google account should have the same email address for which the registration was made on the Allegro website, and another account should have completely different email address. The user is on the login Allegro page.

step.actions: Click the "Zaloguj przez Google" button. Use Google account with the same email address, that was also used to register on Allegro website.
step.expectedresults: The message about connecting both accounts has been displayed. The user is successfully logged into Allegro Account.

step.actions: Click "Zaloguj przez Google" button. Use Google account with different email address than email that was also used to register on Allegro webiste.
step.expectedresults: The user didn't log in. There is a message that given email address doesn't exist in the data base. There is also a short form to register on Allegro website.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of "Nie pamietasz hasła" link.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this functionality works properly, and after clicking on the link the user is redirected to the password change page.
testcase.preconditions: The user has three Allegro accounts: active, banned and deleted, and is on the Allegro login page.

step.actions: Click "Nie pamietasz hasła?" link, after redirecting to the password change page, leave the form blank.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message about the lack of an email address or login.

step.actions: Click "Nie pamietasz hasła?" link, after redirecting to the password change page, fill in the field with data that doesn't exsists in the Allegro data base.
step.expectedresults: There is a message about the lack of account with this kind of data.

step.actions: Click "Nie pamietasz hasła?" link, after redirecting to the password change page, fill in the field with data that exists in the Allegro data base.
step.expectedresults: A code to change the password has been sent to the user's email.

step.actions: Click "Nie pamiętasz hasła" link, after redirecting to the password change page, fill in the field with an account data that has been banned.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message about wrong login or email.

step.actions: Click "Nie pamietasz hasła?" link, after redirecting to the password change page, fill in the field with an account data that has been deleted.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message about wrong login or email.

step.actions: Click "Nie pamietasz hasła" link, after redirecting to the password change page, fill in the field with incorrect email address that contains diacritical marks or free space.
step.expectedresults: There is an error message about wrong login or email.

testcase.name: Blocked user login attempt.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that blocked user can't log into his/her Allegro account.
testcase.preconditions: The user has an account that is blocked and is on the Allegro login page.

step.actions: Log in to Allegro using data of blocked account.
step.expectedresults: The user couldn't log in.

testcase.name: An attempt to login a user with deleted account.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the user with deleted account can't be log in on this account any more.
testcase.preconditions: The user has an account that has been deleted and is on the Allegro login page.

step.actions: Log in to Allegro account using data of deleted account.
step.expectedresults: The user can't log in. There is a message that this account doesn't exist.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of the "ZAREJESTRUJ SIĘ" button.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this button works properly and after clicking on it, the user is redirected to registration page.
testcase.preconditions: The user is on the Allegro login page.

step.actions: Click the ''ZAREJESTRUJ SIĘ'' button.
step.expectedresults: The user is redirected to the registration allegro page.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of adding an item.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this functionality adds an item with unchanged data.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro, the shopping cart is empty and the user is on the main Allegro page.

step.actions: Add a new item, and click the "Dodaj do koszyka" button.
step.expectedresults: The item has been added to the shopping cart.

step.actions: Add a new item to the shopping cart, then add another item of the same seller from the small list under the item that you added ("Inne przedmioty sprzedającego").
step.expectedresults: The item has been added to the shopping cart.

testcase.name: Checking the memory of the shopping cart.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that after leaving our shopping cart our items are still there when we come back.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro, there are a few items added to the shopping cart and the user is on the shopping cart page.

step.actions: Go to the main Allegro page, then go back to the shopping cart again.
step.expectedresults: All the previously added items should be still there.

step.actions: Close Allegro website then go back to the Allegro main page and open your shopping cart again.
step.expectedresults: All the previously added items should be still there.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of "sprzedający" checkbox.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this functionality checks and unchecks items from the same seller. This option is checked by default.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro, there are a few items from different sellers added to the shopping cart and the user is on the shopping cart page.

step.actions: Uncheck a random seller.
step.expectedresults: All items of that seller should be automatically unchecked.

step.actions: Check the seller that has been unchecked.
step.expectedresults: All items of that seller should be automatically checked again.

step.actions: Uncheck a random seller, go to the main Allegro page then go back to your shopping cart.
step.expectedresults: The act of unchecking this seller should be remebered by the page.

step.actions: Select the seller that has been deselected, go to the main Allegro page then go back to your shopping cart.
step.expectedresults: The act of checking this seller should be remembered by the page.

step.actions: Uncheck a random seller, close Allegro website and then go back to your shopping cart again.
step.expectedresults: The act of unchecking that seller should be remembered by the page.

step.actions: Select the seller that has been deselected, close Allegro website and then go back to your shopping cart again.
step.expectedresults: The act of checking this seller should be remember by the page.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of checked "cały koszyk" checkbox.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this functionality selects all items inside the shopping cart by default, and by unchecking this checkbox all items in the shopping cart are deselected. Also, when any item is being deselected separately this option is being automatcaly unchecked.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro and the shopping cart is opened, inside the shopping cart there are a few items already added. The "cały koszyk" checkbox is checked.

step.actions: Uncheck the "cały koszyk" checkbox.
step.expectedresults: All items should be deselected and grayed out including the "cały koszyk" box

step.actions: Check the "cały koszyk" box and uncheck picked item from the shopping cart using the checkbox next to its image.
step.expectedresults: The "cały koszyk"checkbox has been unchecked, the clicked item is grayed out/inactive but the rest of items are still colorfull and active.

step.actions: Check the "cały koszyk" again and uncheck a random seller using checkbox next to its name.
step.expectedresults: The "cały koszyk" checkbox stays unchecked, items of the seller grayed out but the rest of items  not own by this seller are still colorfull and active.

step.actions: Go to Allegro home page and go back to the shopping cart.
step.expectedresults: The page has been opended properly, without any errors and the "cały koszyk" checkbox stayed unchecked.

step.actions: Add a new product to the shopping cart, and go the shopping cart page.
step.expectedresults: The added item should be checked, the rest items stay unchecked including the "cały koszyk" checkbox.

step.actions: Close Allegro website, then go back to you shopping cart again.
step.expectedresults: All items should stay being unchecked.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of unchecked "cały koszyk" checkbox.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that when you check "cały koszyk" checkbox this functionality selects all items inside the shopping cart and makes them colorfull/active.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro and the shopping cart is opened, inside the shopping cart there are a few items already added. The "cały koszyk" checkbox is unchecked.

step.actions: Check picked item from the shopping cart using the checkbox next to its image.
step.expectedresults: The "cały koszyk"checkbox stayed unchecked but the clicked item became colorfull/active.

step.actions: Check the seller who is unchecked using the checkbox next to its name.
step.expectedresults: The "cały koszyk" checkbox stayed unchecked.

step.actions: Check the "cały koszyk" checkbox.
step.expectedresults: All items should be selected and colorful including the "cały koszyk" option.

step.actions: Add a new product to the shopping cart, and go the shopping cart page.
step.expectedresults: The added item should be checked, the rest items should be also checked including the "cały koszyk" checkbox.

step.actions: Go to Allegro home page and go back to the shopping cart.
step.expectedresults: The page has been opened properly, and the "cały koszyk" checkbox stays being checked.

step.actions: Close Allegro website, then go back to your shopping cart again.
step.expectedresults: All items should stay being checked including the "cały koszyk" checkbox.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of removing items.
testcase.summary:
We are confirming that this functionality removes items from the shopping cart.

Here we have two options: we can select few or all items to be removed or do it one by one using the bin icon.
testcase.preconditions:
The user is logged in to Allegro, there are a few items from different sellers added to the shopping cart and the user is on the shopping cart page.

Preconditions apply to every step action.

step.actions: Remove an item (using the bin icon) from your shopping cart.
step.expectedresults: The item has been removed from the shopping cart.

step.actions: Remove an item from your shopping cart (using the bin icon), then find this item again and try to add it to the shopping cart.
step.expectedresults: The item has been successfully added to the shopping cart again.

step.actions: Make sure that all items are selected apart from one seller, use the  "Usuń" link --> "Usuń zaznaczone".
step.expectedresults: All selected items has been removed apart from these items that belong to the seller who has been unchecked.

step.actions: Make sure that all items are selected apart from one, use the "Usuń" link --> "Usuń zaznaczone".
step.expectedresults: All selected items has been removed apart from this one unchecked item.

step.actions: Remove all items from the shopping cart using the "Usuń" link --> "Usuń Wszystko".
step.expectedresults: The shopping cart is empty.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of the "Dostawa i płatność" button.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this button redirects a user to the transaction page.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro, there are a few items added to the shopping cart and the user is on the shopping cart page.

step.actions: Click the "Dostawa i płatność" button.
step.expectedresults: The user has been redirected to the tansaction page.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of the "Kontynuuj zakupy" button.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this button redirects the user to the last visited page to continue shopping.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro, there is at least one item added to the shopping cart and the user is on the shopping cart page.

step.actions: Click the "Kontynuuj zakupy" button.
step.expectedresults: The user is redirected to the last visited page to continue shopping.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of "Kup na raty" button.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the user gets redirected to the transaction where after picking any delivery method, the user can go to the installment application.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro, there is at least one item with an installment option added to the shopping cart and the user is on the shopping cart page.

step.actions: Click the "Kup na raty" button.
step.expectedresults: The user has been redirected to the transaction page with the installment application.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of "Kup teraz".
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this functionality gives us an option of buying an item much faster thanks to redirecting us instanlty to the transaction page.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro, and there are available products on Allegro website.

step.actions: Pick a new item and click the "Kup teraz" option.
step.expectedresults: The user gets redirected to the transaction page.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of "Kupuję i Płacę"
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this functionality orders items that we have inside our shopping cart, and we become their owners.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro, there is one item added to the shopping cart and the user is on the transaction page.

step.actions: Pick any delivery method and click the "Kupuję i Płacę" button.
step.expectedresults: The user has paid and became an owner of the item inside the shopping list.

step.actions: Add more new items to the shopping cart, then uncheck few of them, then click the "Kupuję i Płacę" button.
step.expectedresults: The user has paid and became an owner only of the items which have been selected inside the shopping cart.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of SMART packet.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that when we bought SMART packet, when we have an item that costs 40 polish złoty or more, our shipping is free.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro, bought SMART packet, there are added three items to the shopping cart, two have SMART option and cost 40zł or more, and one that doesn't have SMART option, the user is on the shopping cart page.

step.actions: Make sure that all items are selected then click "Dostawa i Płatność" button.
step.expectedresults: The option SMART is available for two items that cost 40zł or more, but for the item that doesn't include SMART option the delivery cost is added.

step.actions: Inside the shopping cart uncheck the item that doesn't have SMART option. Click the "Dostawa i Płatność" button, then pick SMART free delivery.
step.expectedresults: The delivery cost should be 0,00zł.

testcase.name: Boundary values for SMART packet.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the SMART packet works when an item costs at least 40 zł.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro, there are added 3 items to the shopping cart with SMART option: firs item costs less than 40zł, second costs 40zł, and the last one costs more than 40zł, the user is on the shopping cart page.

step.actions: Uncheck all items apart from the item for less than 40zł. Then go to the transaction page.
step.expectedresults: The option SMART isn't available for this amount of money.

step.actions: Make sure that selected item is with the price more than 40zł. The rest in deselected. Then go to the transaction page.
step.expectedresults: The option SMART is available for this amount of money.

step.actions: Make sure that selected item is with the exact price 40zł. The rest in deselected. Then go to the transaction page.
step.expectedresults: The option SMART is available for this amount of money.

testcase.name: Boundary values for the quantity of goods.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the user can order only available amount of an item.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro, there is a random item added to the shopping cart and there are X items in stock of this product, the user is on the shopping cart page.

step.actions: Change the amount using a mouse. Set an amount of the item to 0.
step.expectedresults: Its impossible to set an amount of an item to 0.

step.actions: Change the amount using a mouse. Set an amount of the item higher than X items in stock.
step.expectedresults: It's impossible to set higher amount of an item than this what is available in stock.

step.actions: Change the amount using a mouse and set it half of the amount of this item what is in stock.
step.expectedresults: This amount of an item is available for the user.

step.actions: Change the amount using the keyboard. Type in an amount of the product to 0.
step.expectedresults: Its impossible to set an ammount of an item to 0.

step.actions: Change the amount using the keyboard. Type in an amount of the item higher than X items in stock.
step.expectedresults: It's impossible to set higer amount of an item than this what is available in stock.

step.actions: Change the amount using a keyboard and type in half of the amount of this item what is in stock.
step.expectedresults: This amount of an item os available fro the user.

testcase.name: Mathematical values.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the gross value is correctly calculated including previously picked shipping options.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro, there are a few items added the shopping cart with different prices, the user is on the transaction page.

step.actions: Verify that the gross value for individual items is correct + the shipping cost.
step.expectedresults: The verification is correct.

step.actions: Verify that the gross value for all items is correct + the shipping cost.
step.expectedresults: The verification is correct.

testcase.name: An attempt to buy an item by a user not being logged in.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that a user can buy items only when he previously been registered on the Allegro website.
testcase.preconditions: The user is NOT log in to Allegro, the user is on the main Allegro page and there are available items to buy on Allegro website.

step.actions: Add new items or an item to the shopping cart, then click "Dostawa i Płatność" button.
step.expectedresults: This option is not available for users that have not been registered.

testcase.name: The shopping cart memory of a user that forgot to log in.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that  items which sit inside our shopping cart without being previously logged in will be remembered.
testcase.preconditions: The user is NOT logged in to Allegro, there are a few items added to the shopping list, the user is on the main Allegro page.

step.actions: Log in to your Allegro account and check your shopping cart again.
step.expectedresults: All previously picked items should be still there.

testcase.name: Validation of the "Ilość" field.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this field accepts only positive numbers.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro, there is an item added to the shopping cart, the user is on the shopping cart page.

step.actions: Type inside the field a number smaller than 0.
step.expectedresults: The field doesn't accept numbers smaller than 0.

step.actions: Type inside the field some letters(small and big ones),a space, special signs and diacritical marks.
step.expectedresults: The field doesn't accept letters, special and diacritical marks.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of "Inne przedmioty sprzedającego" inside the shopping cart.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this functionality shows a small list of items of a seller from who we added an item to the shopping cart. It is opened by default.
testcase.preconditions: The user in logged in to Allegro, there is an item added to the shopping cart, the user is on the shopping cart page.

step.actions: Uncheck the option "Inne przedmioty sprzedającego" using the arrow.
step.expectedresults: The small list of items has been hidden.

step.actions: Check the option "Inne przedmioty sprzedającego" again using the arrow.
step.expectedresults: The small list of items has opened.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of the search box inside the "Inne przedmioty sprzedającego" option.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that thanks to this box we can search for more items that the seller may have.
testcase.preconditions: The user in logged in to Allegro, there is an item added to the shopping cart, the user is on the shopping cart page

step.actions: Type in any name of an item that is visible inside "Inne predmioty sprzedającego" and click the magnifying glass icon.
step.expectedresults: Only all the items that contain this name should display on that list.

step.actions: Type in a name that can't be found for example: "mydełeczko" and click the magnifying glass icon.
step.expectedresults: There is a message saying that the seller doesn't have this what you are looking for.

testcase.name: Validation of the search box inside the "Inne przedmioty sprzedającego" option.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the search box accepts all kinds of data(numbers, diacritical marks, special signs, spaces, letters).
testcase.preconditions: The user in logged in to Allegro, there is an item added to the shopping cart, the user is on the shopping cart page.

step.actions: Inside the search box type in some numbers, letters, diacritical marks, special signs and spaces and click the magnifying glass icon.
step.expectedresults: The search box accepts all of the data, but there is a message saying that the seller doesn't have this what you are looking for.

testcase.name: An attempt of installment purchase of an item without a user being logged in.
testcase.summary: We are confirming that the user can't buy an item in installments without being logged in to Allegro.
testcase.preconditions: The user is NOT logged in to Allegro, there is an item added with installments option inside the shopping cart, the user is on the shopping cart page.

step.actions: Click the "Kup na raty" button.
step.expectedresults: The user is redirected to the Allegro login page. The purchase is not possible without an account.

testcase.name: Checking functionality of "wyczyść wyszukiwanie" inside the "Inne przedmioty sprzedającego" option
testcase.summary: We are confirming that this functionality clears everything what has been typed in iside the search box.
testcase.preconditions: The user is logged in to Allegro, there is an item added to the shopping cart, the user is on the shopping cart page.

step.actions: Fill in the search box with random data then click "wyczyść wyszukiwanie" option.
step.expectedresults: All of the data should be cleared out.
